intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: add middlebox('copyright monitoring') for group('students')
intents.text: If a student is in obvious violations of copyright law by using a room's wired connection (ie ResNet) to distribute copyrighted materials, the room's connection will be disabled, and the issue could be sent to Housing Student Judicial Affairs

parts.text: law by using a room's wired connection (ie ResNet) to distribute copyrighted materials, the room's connection will be disabled, and the issue could be sent to Housing Student Judicial Affairs

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University of Illinois') unset bandwidth()
intents.text: Currently, the University of Illinois does not have any rate limits

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University Housing') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: University Housing monitors only the amount of traffic of each user

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') block service('CounterStrike server')
intents.text: CounterStrike server is blocked by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('AIM chat'), service('file transfer')
intents.text: AIM chat and file transfering is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('Battlenet')
intents.text: Battlenet is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('H323 video conferencing')
intents.text: H323 video conferencing is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') block service('Everquest')
intents.text: Everquest is blocked by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('HTTP'), protocol('HTTPS')
intents.text: HTTP and HTTPS are allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('IMAP'), protocol('secure IMAP')
intents.text: IMAP and secure IMAP are allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') block service('MSN video'), service('MSN audio') allow service('MSN chat'), service('MSN application sharing')
intents.text: MSN audio and video communications are not allowed by the University firewall, but the MSN chat, application sharing and file transferring are not blocked

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('Net2Phone')
intents.text: Net2Phone is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('PC Telephone')
intents.text: PC-Telephone is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('POP3'), protocol('secure POP')
intents.text: POP3 and secure POP are allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('SMTP')
intents.text: SMTP is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('Sony Playstation 2')
intents.text: Sony Playstation 2 is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('SSH')
intents.text: SSH is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('Telnet')
intents.text: Telnet is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow service('Sorenson Videophone 200')
intents.text: Sorenson Videophone 200 is allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('University') add middlebox('firewall') allow protocol('ftp'), protocol('sftp')
intents.text: FTP and SFTP servers are allowed by the University firewall

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('students') set quota('100', 'gb/wk')
intents.text: Students data limit is 100 GB per week

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('students') set quota('10', 'gb/d') start hour(10:00) end hour('24:00')
intents.text: Students 10 GB a day download quotas are on 10 AM to Midnight

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: The system passively monitors the network throughput when traffic is light

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('ResNet'), endpoint('UIC wireless') set quota('6', 'gb/d') start hour('24:00') end hour('24:00')
intents.text: There is a 6 GB per 24-hour period upload or download data transfer limit, starting at midnight of each day, on all your combined traffic on ResNet and UIC wireless

parts.text: of each day, on all of your combined traffic

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('hosts') block service('file sharing')
intents.text: Guests cannot run any file sharing/downloading program

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') set quota('10', 'gb/d')
intents.text: No individual service or system running on the wired/wireless network should use more than 10 gigabytes of bandwidth per day, regardless of whether it is in inbound or outbound over the commodity network link

parts.text: No individual service or system running

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: add middlebox('overuse notification') set quota('10', 'gb/wk')
intents.text: The system will trigger an overuse notification if the average for either inbound or outbound usage exceeds 10 GB per week

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('students') set quota('download', '50', 'mb/h'), quota('upload', '2000', 'mb/h')
intents.text: Quotas for students are 5000 Megabyte per hr download and 2000 Megabyte per hour upload

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('dorms') block protocol('nat')
intents.text: Routers or anything else that does routing or NAT are prohibited from MITNet as they interfere with the operation of the network

parts.text: Routers or anything else that does routing or
as they interfere with the operation of the network

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('hosts') set quota('download', '18', 'gb'), bandwidth('max', '2', 'mbps')
intents.text: When a total of 18 gigabytes of data is reached, the individual's bandwidth rate limit is set to 2 Mbps

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('hosts') set bandwidth('max', '4', 'mbps')
intents.text: The individual will have a 4 Mbps bandwidth rate limit

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: from endpoint('RHIT-OPEN') to endpoint('internal network') for group('hosts') block traffic('any')
intents.text: RHIT-OPEN will work in labs, classrooms and residence halls but does not allow the user to access the internal Rose-Hulman network

parts.text: will work in labs, classrooms and residence halls but

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('ResNet'), endpoint('UIC wireless') block protocol('ftp'), protocol('telnet'), traffic('peer2peer'), protocol('http'), service('irc'), traffic('dns'), service(email)
intents.text: You may not run FTP, telnet, peer-to-peer, HTTP, IRC, DNS and mail server on your ResNet or UIC wireless

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('students') set quota('200', 'gb/mth')
intents.text: Students have 200 GB of Free monthly usage

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('staff') set quota('500', 'gb/wk')
intents.text: Faculty members have 500 Gb per week of free network use

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('students') set quota('5','gb/d') start hour(06:00)
intents.text: Students have a quota of 5 GB per day The quota is reset at 6am

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('host') set bandwidth('max', '3', 'mbps')
intents.text: Internet is limited to 3 Mbps per host

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for traffic ('peer2peer'), endpoint('campus') set bandwidth('max', '30', 'mbps')
intents.text: P2P application is separately capped at 30 Mbps for the entire campus

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for group('hosts') set bandwidth('max', '5', 'mbps')
intents.text: Guests' network is rate-limited to 5 Mb/s per user

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('dorms') set quota('200','gb/wk')
intents.text: The ResNet cap is currently 200 gigabytes per each 7 day period of combined incoming and outgoing traffic

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: from endpoint('internet') to endpoint('UW network') block protocol('ftp')
intents.text: These network security changes include blocking traffic from the Internet into the UW network over FTP

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('network border system'), middlebox('intrusion prevention'), middlebox('firewall'), middlebox('unit firewall')
intents.text: Elements of network security currently include the following four solutions: Network Border Infrastructure System, Intrusion Prevention System, Firewalls, and Custom Unit Firewalls

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: ACT/IT Infrastructure monitors traffic on the network for the purpose of maintaining proper network function

parts.text: for the purpose of maintaining proper network function

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: CIS restricts traffic that is known to cause damage to the network or hosts on it, such as NETBIOS

parts.text: traffic that is known to cause damage
or hosts on it, such as

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: All network traffic passing in or out of Brown's network is monitored by an intrusion detection system for signs of compromises

parts.text: All network traffic passing in or out

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('ResNet'), endpoint('NYURoam') block protocol('ftp'), service('listserver'), traffic('peer2peer')
intents.text: You may not run any services (e.g., FTP services, listservers, P2P file sharing servers, publishing files via generic file services, etc.) via NYU's ResNet or NYURoam wireless networks

parts.text: , publishing files via generic file services, etc.)

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('dorms') unset bandwidth()
intents.text: Housing does not normally limit the amount of bandwidth

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('firewall')
intents.text: The UVA More Secure Network uses a firewall, a network security device designed to help protect your computer from hackers and other malicious people on the Internet.

parts.text: , a network security device designed to help protect your computer from hackers and other malicious people on the Internet.

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') block service('H323 video conferencing')
intents.text: The network firewall does prevent some applications from working in their normal manner, for example, video and audio conferencing products that use the H.323

parts.text: some applications from working in their normal manner, for example,
video and audio conferencing products that use the H.323

intents.nile: define intent uniIntent: for endpoint('network') add middlebox('traffic monitor')
intents.text: The UC Davis network is continually scanned for prohibited activities and network threats.

parts.text: for prohibited activities and network threats.
